titleStmt.title: 1602. 1603. A true report of all the burials and christnings within the Citie of London and the liberties thereof, from the 23. of December, 1602 to the 22. of December, 1603 VVhereunto is added the number of euery seuerall parish, from the 14. of Iuly, to the 22. of December, aswell within the Citie of London, and the liberties thereof, as in other parishes in the skirts of the citie and out of the freedome, adioyning to the Citie: according to the report made to the Kings most Excellent Maiestie, by the Company of Parish Clearkes of the same citie.
Bills of mortality. 1602-12-23 to 1603-12-22
titleStmt.author: Worshipful Company of Parish Clerks.

titleStmt.title: 1602. 1603. A true report of all the burials and christnings within the Citie of London and the liberties thereof, from the 23. of December, 1602 to the 22. of December, 1603 VVhereunto is added the number of euery seuerall parish, from the 14. of Iuly, to the 22. of December, aswell within the Citie of London, and the liberties thereof, as in other parishes in the skirts of the citie and out of the freedome, adioyning to the Citie: according to the report made to the Kings most Excellent Maiestie, by the Company of Parish Clearkes of the same citie.
Bills of mortality. 1602-12-23 to 1603-12-22
titleStmt.author: Worshipful Company of Parish Clerks.

notesStmt.note: Another edition of part I of STC 16740--STC.
This edition has both the royal arms and the arms of London at top.
Reproduction of original in the Guildhall Library, London, England.
